actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the classification of any naphtha described as both a petroleum product and a benzenoid chemical.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a duty for naphthas derived from petroleum, shale oil, natural gas or combinations thereof (except motor fuel).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the classification of any naphtha described as both a petroleum product and a benzenoid chemical.
